comments.author: ryan@rfk.id.au
comments.text: Do we want to land this in its current not-hooked-up-to-anything state, or do we want to incorporate it into https://github.com/a-s-dev/gecko-dev for now until we're ready to also land code that exercises it?

comments.raw_text: I'd like to land it as it would allow us to develop using artifacts build.
